TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PathGradientBrush extends System.Drawing.Brush
Public NotInheritable Class PathGradientBrush Inherits Brush
public ref class PathGradientBrush sealed : System::Drawing::Brush

summary.span: 封裝 物件，這個物件會使用漸層來填滿 物件的內部。

span.span: Encapsulates a object that fills the interior of a object with a gradient.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 色彩漸層會逐漸從中心點的路徑的路徑外邊界邊緣的色彩。The color gradient is a smooth shading of colors from the center point of the path to the outside boundary edge of the path. Blend 因素、 位置和樣式會影響所使用漸層的開始位置和結束，和變化的速度如何。Blend factors, positions, and style affect where the gradient starts and ends, and how fast it changes shade. 路徑漸層筆刷並不會遵照屬性物件，用來進行繪製。Path gradient brushes do not obey the property of the object used to do the drawing. 填滿使用的區域不論平滑模式的物件會呈現相同的方式 （別名）。Areas filled using a object are rendered the same way (aliased) regardless of the smoothing mode. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立。The following code example shows how to create a . 這個範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要e 是參數的。This example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires the e, which is a parameter of . remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含對應的 blend 因素和位置的陣列。A contains corresponding arrays of blend factors and positions. Blend 因素指定開始色彩和結束色彩對應的位置使用的百分比。The blend factors specify the percentages of the starting color and ending color to use at the corresponding position. 提供位置沿著漸層路徑距離的百分比。The positions are given as a percentage of distance along the gradient path.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立圖形路徑，並新增一個矩形。Creates a graphics path and adds a rectangle to it. - 建立從路徑點 （在此範例中，點會形成矩形中，但它可能是大部分任何圖形）。Creates a from the path points (in this example, the points form a rectangle, but it could be most any shape). - 設定的中心色彩為紅色，周圍的藍色色彩。Sets the center color to red and the surrounding color to blue. - 繪製螢幕在套用 multiply 轉換之前。Draws the to the screen prior to applying the multiply transform. - 建立旋轉 90 度的筆刷，並將它轉換兩個軸的 100 的矩陣。Creates s matrix that rotates the brush 90 degrees and translates it by 100 in both axes. - 此矩陣使用套用至筆刷方法。Applies this matrix to the brush by using the method. - 將筆刷繪製到螢幕。Draws the brush to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立圖形路徑，並新增一個矩形。Creates a graphics path and adds a rectangle to it. - 建立從路徑點 （在此範例中，點會形成矩形中，但它可能是大部分任何圖形）。Creates a from the path points (in this example, the points form a rectangle, but it could be most any shape). - 設定的中心色彩為紅色，周圍的藍色色彩。Sets the center color to red and the surrounding color to blue. - 繪製螢幕之前套用旋轉轉換。Draws the to the screen prior to applying the rotate transform. - 旋轉轉換套用到筆刷，方式是使用其方法。Applies the rotate transform to the brush by using its method. - 繪製到螢幕的旋轉的筆刷 （矩形）。Draws the rotated brush (rectangle) to the screen. 請注意，下方的矩形相較於在轉譯之前所繪製的旋轉 45 度。Notice that the bottom rectangle is rotated 45 degrees as compared to the one drawn prior to the translation. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 程式碼The code - 建立圖形路徑，並新增一個矩形。Creates a graphics path and adds a rectangle to it. - 建立從路徑點 （在此範例中，點會形成矩形中，但它可能是大部分任何圖形）。Creates a from the path points (in this example, the points form a rectangle, but it could be most any shape). - 設定的中心色彩為紅色，周圍的藍色色彩。Sets the center color to red and the surrounding color to blue. - 繪製螢幕之前套用的小數位數的轉換。Draws the to the screen prior to applying the scale transform. - 使用小數位數轉換套用到筆刷其方法。Applies the scale transform to the brush by using its method. - 呼叫方法來移動筆刷矩形，使它不會不重疊先前繪製到螢幕的一個。Calls the method to move the brush rectangle such that it does not overlay the one drawn to the screen earlier. - 將轉換的筆刷矩形繪製至螢幕。Draws the translated brush rectangle to the screen. 請注意下方的矩形是長時間在 x 軸是轉換之前所繪製的一倍。Notice that the bottom rectangle is twice as long in the x-axis as is the one drawn prior to the translation. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 使用中心色彩和一個環繞色彩的線型減少來建立漸層。

span.span: Creates a gradient with a center color and a linear falloff to one surrounding color.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetBlendTriangularShape(float32 focus) cil managed

param.name: focus
param.span: 從 0 到 1 的值，這個值指定中心色彩將沿著從路徑中心至路徑邊界的任何圓形來達到最大濃度的位置。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies where, along any radial from the center of the path to the path's boundary, the center color will be at its highest intensity.

param.span: 值 1 (預設值) 會將最大濃度置於路徑的中心。

span.span: A value of 1 (the default) places the highest intensity at the center of the path.

summary.span: 使用中心色彩和一個環繞色彩的線型減少來建立漸層。

span.span: Creates a gradient with a center color and a linear falloff to one surrounding color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有一個以上的色彩中陣列中的第一個色彩的陣列，用於結束色彩。If there is more than one color in the array, the first color in the array is used for the ending color. 此陣列中指定的色彩會用於離散筆刷的邊界路徑上的點。The colors specified in this array are used for discrete points on the brush's boundary path. ## Examples 如需範例，請參閱 `.`For an example, see `.`

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetBlendTriangularShape (float focus, float scale);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetBlendTriangularShape(float32 focus, float32 scale) cil managed
Public Sub SetBlendTriangularShape (focus As Single, scale As Single)
public: void SetBlendTriangularShape(float focus, float scale);

param.name: focus
param.span: 從 0 到 1 的值，這個值指定中心色彩將沿著從路徑中心至路徑邊界的任何圓形來達到最大濃度的位置。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies where, along any radial from the center of the path to the path's boundary, the center color will be at its highest intensity.

param.span: 值 1 (預設值) 會將最大濃度置於路徑的中心。

span.span: A value of 1 (the default) places the highest intensity at the center of the path.

param.name: scale
param.span: 從 0 到 1 的值，這個值指定使用邊界色彩來造成漸變之中心色彩的最大濃度。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies the maximum intensity of the center color that gets blended with the boundary color.

param.span: 值 1 會讓中心色彩達到最高的可能濃度，並且這個值是預設值。

span.span: A value of 1 causes the highest possible intensity of the center color, and it is the default value.

summary.span: 使用中心色彩和每個環繞色彩的線型減少來建立漸層。

span.span: Creates a gradient with a center color and a linear falloff to each surrounding color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有一個以上的色彩中陣列中的第一個色彩的陣列，用於結束色彩。If there is more than one color in the array, the first color in the array is used for the ending color. 此陣列中指定的色彩會用於筆刷的邊界路徑上的不連續點的色彩。The colors specified in this array are colors used for discrete points on the brush's boundary path. 根據預設，當您移動路徑漸層的界限從中心點，色彩逐漸從界限色彩變更為中間色彩。By default, as you move from the boundary of a path gradient to the center point, the color changes gradually from the boundary color to the center color. 您可以自訂的定位和混合的界限和中央色彩，其方式呼叫這個方法。You can customize the positioning and blending of the boundary and center colors by calling this method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立圖形路徑，並新增一個矩形。Creates a graphics path and adds a rectangle to it. - 建立從路徑點 （在此範例中，點會形成矩形中，但它可能是大部分任何圖形）。Creates a from the path points (in this example, the points form a rectangle, but it could be most any shape). - 設定的中心色彩為紅色，周圍的藍色色彩。Sets the center color to red and the surrounding color to blue. - 繪製螢幕在套用 blend 轉換之前。Draws the to the screen prior to applying the blend transform. - Blend 轉換套用到筆刷，方式是使用其方法。Applies the blend transform to the brush by using its method. - 呼叫方法來移動筆刷矩形，使它不會不重疊先前繪製到螢幕的一個。Calls the method to move the brush rectangle such that it does not overlay the one drawn to the screen earlier. - 轉換的筆刷繪製矩形會繪製到螢幕。Draws the transformed-brush rectangle is drawn to the screen. 請注意，最大中心色彩 （紅色） 到一半的方式，從中心路徑路徑界限。Notice that the maximum center color (red) is located half way from the center of the path to the path boundary. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#4)]

summary.span: 根據鐘型曲線在中心色彩和第一個環繞色彩之間建立漸層減少。

span.span: Creates a gradient falloff between the center color and the first surrounding color based on a bell-shaped curve.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetSigmaBellShape(float32 focus) cil managed

param.name: focus
param.span: 從 0 到 1 的值，這個值指定中心色彩將沿著從路徑中心至路徑邊界的任何圓形來達到最大濃度的位置。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies where, along any radial from the center of the path to the path's boundary, the center color will be at its highest intensity.

param.span: 值 1 (預設值) 會將最大濃度置於路徑的中心。

span.span: A value of 1 (the default) places the highest intensity at the center of the path.

summary.span: 建立從路徑中心開始向外至路徑邊界變更色彩的漸層筆刷。

span.span: Creates a gradient brush that changes color starting from the center of the path outward to the path's boundary.

summary.span: 從一個色彩轉換為另一個色彩是根據鐘型曲線。

span.span: The transition from one color to another is based on a bell-shaped curve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有一個以上的色彩中陣列中的第一個色彩的陣列，用於結束色彩。If there is more than one color in the array, the first color in the array is used for the ending color. 此陣列中指定的色彩會用於筆刷的邊界路徑上的不連續點的色彩。The colors specified in this array are colors used for discrete points on the brush's boundary path. 根據預設，當您移動路徑漸層的界限從中心點，色彩逐漸從界限色彩變更為中間色彩。By default, as you move from the boundary of a path gradient to the center point, the color changes gradually from the boundary color to the center color. 您可以自訂的定位和混合的界限和中央色彩，其方式呼叫這個方法。You can customize the positioning and blending of the boundary and center colors by calling this method. ## Examples 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetSigmaBellShape (float focus, float scale);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetSigmaBellShape(float32 focus, float32 scale) cil managed
Public Sub SetSigmaBellShape (focus As Single, scale As Single)
public: void SetSigmaBellShape(float focus, float scale);

param.name: focus
param.span: 從 0 到 1 的值，這個值指定中心色彩將沿著從路徑中心至路徑邊界的任何圓形來達到最大濃度的位置。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies where, along any radial from the center of the path to the path's boundary, the center color will be at its highest intensity.

param.span: 值 1 (預設值) 會將最大濃度置於路徑的中心。

span.span: A value of 1 (the default) places the highest intensity at the center of the path.

param.name: scale
param.span: 從 0 到 1 的值，這個值指定使用邊界色彩來造成漸變之中心色彩的最大濃度。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies the maximum intensity of the center color that gets blended with the boundary color.

param.span: 值 1 會讓中心色彩達到最高的可能濃度，並且這個值是預設值。

span.span: A value of 1 causes the highest possible intensity of the center color, and it is the default value.

summary.span: 建立從路徑中心開始向外至路徑邊界變更色彩的漸層筆刷。

span.span: Creates a gradient brush that changes color starting from the center of the path outward to the path's boundary.

summary.span: 從一個色彩轉換為另一個色彩是根據鐘型曲線。

span.span: The transition from one color to another is based on a bell-shaped curve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有一個以上的色彩中陣列中的第一個色彩的陣列，用於結束色彩。If there is more than one color in the array, the first color in the array is used for the ending color. 此陣列中指定的色彩會用於筆刷的邊界路徑上的不連續點的色彩。The colors specified in this array are colors used for discrete points on the brush's boundary path. 根據預設，當您移動路徑漸層的界限從中心點，色彩逐漸從界限色彩變更為中間色彩。By default, as you move from the boundary of a path gradient to the center point, the color changes gradually from the boundary color to the center color. 您可以自訂的定位和混合的界限和中央色彩，其方式呼叫這個方法。You can customize the positioning and blending of the boundary and center colors by calling this method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立圖形路徑，並新增一個矩形。Creates a graphics path and adds a rectangle to it. - 建立從路徑點 （在此範例中，點會形成矩形中，但它可能是大部分任何圖形）。Creates a from the path points (in this example, the points form a rectangle, but it could be most any shape). - 設定的中心色彩為紅色，周圍的藍色色彩。Sets the center color to red and the surrounding color to blue. - 繪製螢幕在套用 blend 轉換之前。Draws the to the screen prior to applying the blend transform. - Blend 轉換套用到筆刷，方式是使用其方法。Applies the blend transform to the brush by using its method. - 呼叫方法來移動筆刷矩形，使它不會不重疊先前繪製到螢幕的一個。Calls the method to move the brush rectangle such that it does not overlay the one drawn to the screen earlier. - 將轉換筆刷矩形繪製到螢幕。Draws the transformed-brush rectangle to the screen. 請注意，最大中心色彩 （紅色） 到一半的方式，從中心路徑路徑界限。Notice that the maximum center color (red) is located half way from the center of the path to the path boundary. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::Drawing::Color> ^ SurroundColors { cli::array <System::Drawing::Color> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Drawing::Color> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定色彩陣列，對應至這個 所填滿之路徑中的點。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of colors that correspond to the points in the path this fills.

value.span: 結構陣列，表示與這個 所填滿之路徑中的每個點相關聯的色彩。

span.span: An array of structures that represents the colors associated with each point in the path this fills.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個中陣列對應至路徑中的點。Each in the array corresponds to a point in the path.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Drawing2D::Matrix ^ Transform { System::Drawing::Drawing2D::Matrix ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Drawing2D::Matrix ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 的複本，這個複本會為此 定義局部幾何轉換。

span.span: Gets or sets a copy of the that defines a local geometric transform for this .

value.span: 的複本，定義只套用至使用這個 繪製填色的幾何轉換。

span.span: A copy of the that defines a geometric transform that applies only to fills drawn with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 轉換、 縮放、 旋轉或扭曲漸層填滿可用的幾何轉換。A geometric transform can be used to translate, scale, rotate, or skew the gradient fill. 因為矩陣傳回和屬性為筆刷的幾何轉換的複本，當您不再需要時，應該處置的矩陣。Because the matrix returned and by the property is a copy of the brush's geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.

summary.span: 將指定的轉換套用至區域幾何轉換。

span.span: Applies the specified translation to the local geometric transform.

summary.span: 這個方法預先規劃轉換的轉換。

span.span: This method prepends the translation to the transform.
